question: When you picture your ideal day, which feels most aligned?

options.Explorer: Waking up somewhere new, planning a spontaneous adventure.
options.Nurturer: Spending time with loved ones or helping someone in need.
options.Creator: Working on a passion project or creative outlet.
options.Seeker: Reflecting with a journal or reading something that expands my mind.
options.Builder: Tackling a DIY task or organizing something useful.
options.Connector: Meeting up with friends or starting a conversation with someone new.

question: Which compliment would mean the most to you?

options.Nurturer: You make people feel truly cared for.
options.Creator: You're so imaginative and inspiring.
options.Seeker: You really make me think deeper.
options.Builder: You get things done like no one else.

question: What’s your natural role in a group setting?

options.Explorer: The one suggesting something exciting or new.
options.Nurturer: Checking in on how everyone is feeling.
options.Creator: Capturing the moment or telling the story.
options.Seeker: Asking big questions no one else thought of.
options.Builder: Making sure everything is organized and works.
options.Connector: Introducing people who should know each other.

question: Which of these energizes you the most?

options.Explorer: Exploring a new location or experience.
options.Creator: Diving into something hands-on or expressive.
options.Builder: Fixing a system or solving a problem.
options.Connector: Hosting a group or sparking discussion.

options.Explorer: Backpacking through a country I’ve never visited.
options.Nurturer: Volunteering at a local community center.
options.Creator: Launching an online shop or exhibition of my work.
options.Seeker: Attending a weekend retreat or deep-dive course.
options.Builder: Starting a local project with real-world results.
options.Connector: Building a group or club around shared interests.

question: What frustrates you the most about post-work life?

options.Nurturer: Feeling like no one needs me.
options.Creator: Not having an outlet for expression.

question: What’s something you’ve always wanted to do?

options.Explorer: Live abroad or take a solo trip.
options.Nurturer: Mentor someone or support a cause I believe in.
options.Creator: Write a book, start a YouTube channel, or paint a mural.
options.Seeker: Study philosophy, mindfulness, or world religions.
options.Builder: Renovate a home, start a workshop, or fix systems.
options.Connector: Create a podcast, mastermind, or speaker series.

question: Which role did you often play in your work life?

options.Creator: The visionary or ideas person.
options.Seeker: The wise one or devil’s advocate.

question: What kind of content are you most drawn to now?

options.Creator: DIY, design, or artistic inspiration.
options.Seeker: TED Talks, books that change your thinking.
options.Builder: Life hacks, how-tos, or systems design.
options.Connector: Talk shows, interviews, and real conversations.

question: What do you secretly wish more people knew about you?

options.Nurturer: I care more than I let on.
options.Creator: I have so many ideas inside me.
options.Builder: I want to build something meaningful.
